categoryReasons: CATEGORY 1 - Assets added or modified that don't impact base site code
CATEGORY 1 - Changes already behind feature flags
CATEGORY 1 - INFR or FRIN User Interface changes
CATEGORY 1 - Maintenance bug updating user experience
CATEGORY 1 - Production bug blocking fiber units or causing reporting error
CATEGORY 1 - Unit Test and Monitoring changes
CATEGORY 2 - Addition of New Dependencies into Build Process
CATEGORY 2 - API Refactoring or Logic changes
CATEGORY 2 - FRDC UI changes outside of CAT-1 changes
CATEGORY 2 - Impact of new feature flags/unreleased features
